articles.title: Tata Curvv-rival Citroen Basalt revealed; to go on sale in H2 2024 - CarWale
articles.description: Third car from the automaker to be based on the C-Cubed program and will be first launched in India and South America
articles.content:
• Will be first launched in India and South America 
  • Third car from the automaker to be based on the C-Cubed program
